content.rendered:
Directed by Varun V. Sharma

Written by Varun V. Sharma. Aditya Chopra. Jaideep Sahni

Star Saif Ali Khan (Rakesh Trivedi). Rani Mukerji (Vimmi Trivedi). Siddhant Chaturvedi (Kunal Singh). Sharvari Wagh (Sonia Rawat). Pankaj Tripathi (Inspector Jatayu Singh). Prem Chopra (Papaji). Govardhan Asrani (Taharey Singh (as Asrani)). Yashpal Sharma (Chutvaa Chaubey). Brijendra Kala (Mehmood Bhai (Braganza)). Rajiv Gupta (Inspector Rajiv Gupta). Neeraj Sood (Mr. Chadda). Gopal Datt (Nand Kishore (as Gopal Dutt)). Ishtiyak Khan ((as Ishteyak Arif Khan)). Mohit Baghel (Golu Chaubey (as Late Mohit Baghel) )

Language Hindi

Producers Aditya Chopra. Mini Purushot. Sanjay Shivalkar. Gurpreet Singh. Navmeet Singh

Production Yash Raj Films
